name: Only Ten 2D Arena
description:
Rules: 

It's simple! Choose one of the three gerovs. Live and kill your enemies. Complete levels.

A, D. W, S- move  Space - skill  Left click - shoot  Important:

I have nothing to say. Just play and have fun !!!!
